snippet: Approaching $100 million at the box office there, the film was the target of an editorial in China Daily, which said Chinese elements were added to trick the audience.
lead_paragraph: Approaching $100 million at the box office there, the film was the target of an editorial in China Daily, which said Chinese elements were added to trick the audience.

headline.seo: ‘Ironman 3’ Can’t Cut Angst in China Over U.S. Films
headline.main: Success of ‘Iron Man 3’ Hasn’t Reduced Tension Over U.S. Films in China
